title: Lf People to play with or a team/ casual, fun, or serious/
body:
I just want to play with others and meet new people :)
can be serious or fun, i dont mind :) Plat 3 
Play all roles, adc worst tho. but yh if your keen add me in game
IGN: Splinter Stealth

replies.body: Ill play if you have full team ready to go
